title: RIP Chuck E. Cheese Band, Impeachment Party! 11.14.19
itunes:title: RIP Chuck E. Cheese Band, Impeachment Party! 11.14.19
description:
In episode 516, Miles and special guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by comedian Allen Strickland Williams to discuss Jason Bigg's vulgar tweeting history, how the right is handling the impeachment inquiry, Hillary Clinton considering another presidential run, the war on thanksgiving, Disney +, Moby's new tattoo, Chuck E. Cheese getting rid of their animatronic band, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. 21 Important Questions About This Photo Of Jason Biggs And Mr. Mucus
  2. Jason Biggs' vulgar tweets
  3. Jason Biggs's Ugly Twitter Rant Reveals That He's Kind of a Sh*tty Guy
  4. Diplomats detail Ukraine pressure campaign at first open impeachment hearing — live updates
  5. GOP counsel’s defense of back channel to Ukraine: ‘Not as outlandish as it could be’
  6. Fox Cuts To Commercial When Schiff Starts Asking Questions At Open Hearing
  7. Fox News cuts to commercial during the open impeachment hearing right when Adam Schiff begins asking questions
  8. GOP senator: Republicans don't have votes to dismiss impeachment articles
  9. Clinton says she is being urged by ‘many, many, many people’ to run in 2020
  10. A History of the War on Christmas
  11. The Environmental Impact Of Your Thanksgiving Dinner
  12. Despite what conservative media say, liberals are not trying to “cancel” Thanksgiving
  13. ‘Fox’ illustrates ‘American’ holiday with Mexican take on Thanksgiving dinner
  14. Disney+ already has over 10 million users
  15. Moby Really Fuckin' Loves Animals, Man
  16. Chuck E. Cheese’s is breaking up the animatronic band
  17. WATCH: Another Chuck E. Day | Chuck E. Cheese Songs

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
